name: Hebe Camargo
description: '''Hebe Maria Monteiro de Camargo Ravagnani''' {{post-nominals|country=BRA|post-noms=[[Military Order of Saint James of the Sword|DmSE]] • [[Order of the Southern Cross|Dama Oficial]] • [[Order of Prince Henry|DmIH]]}} ({{IPA|pt|ˈɛbi mɐˈɾi.ɐ mõˈtejɾu dʒi kɐˈmaʁɡu ˌʁavɐˈɲɐ̃ni}}; 8 March 1929 – 29 September 2012) was a Brazilian television host, singer and actress. She is considered the "Queen of Brazilian Television" ({{langx|pt|Rainha da Televisão Brasileira}}). She died at her home on 29 September 2012. Her net worth was over US$360 [[Millionaire|million]].
